name: Sinking City
description:
Hi there,

I am 14 and this is my first ever submission to the Ludum Dare 48 game jam. I had 72 hours (including school) to make this game according to the theme: DEEPER AND DEEPER.

You are in a skyscraper and the city has flooded. Your objective is to get to the roof where a helicopter can rescue you. There are 20 floors to climb and the water is constantly rising. It is getting Deeper And Deeper. I hope you all enjoy!

Feedback is greatly appreciated in the comment section.
